GRAPH: EventGraph

EXEC event_BeginPlay -> n1.Execute

BLUEPRINT: <Name>
PARENT: <ParentClass>
GRAPH: EventGraph
VAR <Name>: <Type> = <Default>
NODE <id>: <NodeType> [Property=Value]
EXEC <from>.<pin> -> <to>.<pin>
DATA <from>.<pin> -> <to>.<pin> [<Type>]

RULES:
- Node IDs: n1, n2, n3...
- Output ONLY DSL code, nothing else
- No explanations, no commentary, no examples

results.prompt: Create a health pickup that adds 25 health on overlap and then destroys itself.
results.output:

PARENT: Actor
CATEGORY: Gameplay

VAR CurrentHealth: Float = 100.0
VAR AmountToHeal: Float = 25.0

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: GetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n3: AddFloat [B=AmountToHeal]
NODE n4: ClampFloat [Min=0.0, Max=100.0]
NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CurrentHealth]
NODE n6: DestroyActor

EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute

DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Float]>

results.prompt: Create a coin pickup Blueprint that adds 1 to a coin counter, plays a sound, and destroys itself when a player overlaps.

NODE n5: SetVar [Variable=CoinCount]
NODE n6: PlaySound [Sound=PickupCoin]
NODE n7: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.True -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n7.Execute

DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Int] {
